poems.title: To my future girl
poems.content:
I should let you know how much I want you now
for the times have been cruel, I don't want to remember how.
I am doing my best to pass this patience test
Still hoping for the fateful day, surely that's the best.

Are your eyes mesmerizing, that could leave me paralyzed?
Is your voice too alluring that you had me hypnotized?
How about your hair, your lips, your ears and finger tips?
And how could I begin to imagine when my hands are on your hips?

I hope you'll be patient, I hope you'll be kind.
Because a guy like me surely is out of mind.
I am far from perfect, in fact, I'm the worst.
but I assure you, my darling, choosing me will not be your remorse.

I hope someday this poem would reach you
this will be a proof that I'm fervently waiting for you
To my future girl, whatever your name is.
I'll call you baby, honey or darling, the only goddess that I would kiss.
